text.div:
Perirectal Lymph Node Involvement

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    369921003 T3: Colon/rectum tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or the nonperitonealized pericolic or perirectal soft tissues (finding)
    372436009 N1: Metastasis in perirectal lymph node or nodes (finding)
    385306002 pN1: Metastasis in perirectal lymph node(s) (anal canal) (finding)
    385308001 pN3: Metastasis in perirectal and inguinal lymph nodes AND/OR bilateral internal iliac AND/OR inguinal lymph nodes (anal canal) (finding)
    433541000124107 Neoplasm of colon regional lymph node staging category N1c: Tumor deposit(s) in subserosa, mesentery, or nonperitonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues without regional nodal metastasis (finding)

name: Perirectal Lymph Node Involvement
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward

concept.display: T3: Colon/rectum tumor invades through the muscularis propria into the subserosa or the nonperitonealized pericolic or perirectal soft tissues (finding)
N1: Metastasis in perirectal lymph node or nodes (finding)
pN1: Metastasis in perirectal lymph node(s) (anal canal) (finding)
pN3: Metastasis in perirectal and inguinal lymph nodes AND/OR bilateral internal iliac AND/OR inguinal lymph nodes (anal canal) (finding)
Neoplasm of colon regional lymph node staging category N1c: Tumor deposit(s) in subserosa, mesentery, or nonperitonealized pericolic or perirectal tissues without regional nodal metastasis (finding)
